method1_output:
Dulu, di hutan belantara yang jauh di Cina, hiduplah seekor panda yang bernama Ming-Ming. Ming-Ming adalah seekor panda yang sangat lucu dan manis, dengan bulu putih dan hitam yang lebat. Dia sangat senang makan bambu dan tidur di bawah sinar matahari.

Suatu hari, ketika Ming-Ming sedang berjalan-jalan di hutan, dia terjebak dalam jebakan yang diletakkan oleh pemburu. Ming-Ming berusaha untuk melepaskan dirinya dan terus berteriak minta tolong, tapi tidak ada yang mendengar.

Tiba-tiba, seekor tikus melihat Ming-Ming dalam bahaya dan memutuskan untuk membantunya. Tikus itu berkata, "Jangan khawatir, Ming-Ming. Aku akan membantumu keluar dari jebakan ini." Dengan giginya yang tajam, tikus itu memotong tali di jebakan dan Ming-Ming berhasil bebas.

Ming-Ming sangat bersyukur kepada tikus itu dan dia bertanya, "Bagaimana aku bisa membalas budi baikmu?" Tikus itu berkata, "Tidak perlu, Ming-Ming. Hanya berjanjilah untuk selalu membantu orang yang membutuhkan bantuanmu." Ming-Ming sangat setuju dan mengucapkan terima kasih kepada tikus itu.

Sejak saat itu, Ming-Ming menjadi panda yang paling ramah di hutan. Dia selalu siap membantu siapa saja yang membutuhkan bantuan dan menjadi teman yang sangat baik untuk semua hewan di hutan. Tikus itu sangat bangga melihat Ming-Ming menjadi panda yang baik hati dan dia terus menjadi sahabat dekatnya. 

Akhirnya, Ming-Ming menjadi legenda di hutan dan dianggap sebagai simbol persahabatan dan kebaikan. Semua hewan menghormatinya dan mencintainya karena sifatnya yang baik dan kebaikan hatinya. Dan setiap kali Ming-Ming melihat tikus itu, dia selalu mengucapkan terima kasih karena telah menyelamatkannya dari bahaya dan membantunya menjadi panda yang lebih baik.
****************English Meaning****************
In the past, in a dense forest far away in China, lived a panda named Ming-Ming. Ming-Ming was a very cute and sweet panda, with thick black and white fur. He loved eating bamboo and sleeping in the sunlight.

One day, while Ming-Ming was walking in the forest, he got caught in a trap set by a hunter. Ming-Ming tried to free himself and screamed for help, but no one heard.

Suddenly, a mouse saw Ming-Ming in danger and decided to help him. The mouse said, "Don't worry, Ming-Ming. I will help you get out of this trap." With its sharp teeth, the mouse cut the rope in the trap and Ming-Ming was able to escape.

Ming-Ming was very grateful to the mouse and asked, "How can I repay your kindness?" The mouse said, "No need, Ming-Ming. Just promise to always help those in need." Ming-Ming agreed wholeheartedly and thanked the mouse.

From that day on, Ming-Ming became the friendliest panda in the forest. He was always ready to help anyone in need and became a very good friend to all the animals in the forest. The mouse was very proud to see Ming-Ming become a kind-hearted panda and they remained close friends.

Finally, Ming-Ming became a legend in the forest and was considered a symbol of friendship and kindness. All the animals respected and loved him for his goodness and kindness. And every time Ming-Ming saw the mouse, he always thanked him for saving him from danger and helping him become a better panda.
method2_step1_output: Please tell a story about panda.
method2_step2_output:
Once upon a time, in the lush green forests of China lived a cute and chubby panda named Po. Po was a lazy fellow who loved to spend most of his time sleeping and munching on bamboo.

One day, while Po was taking his usual nap, he suddenly heard a loud rumbling noise. It was an earthquake! Po was scared and didn't know what to do as he had never experienced an earthquake before. He looked around and saw all the trees swaying and the ground shaking. He knew he had to find shelter.

Po quickly got up and started to run towards a safe place. He ran and ran until he reached the entrance of a cave. Po felt relieved thinking that this would be a secure shelter for him. But to his surprise, when he entered the cave, he found another panda named Ping already residing there.

Ping welcomed Po and offered to share the cave with him. Po was thrilled to have found a friend and a safe place to stay.

As the days passed, Po and Ping became close friends. They played together, ate together, and slept together, feeling safe and secure in each other's company.

One day, as Po was munching on some bamboo, he suddenly heard a loud cry. It was Ping, who had fallen into a trap set by hunters. Po immediately went to his friend's rescue and helped him escape.

After that incident, Po and Ping decided to leave their comfortable shelter and venture out into the world together, facing every challenge as a team.

Today, Po and Ping are renowned pandas who are hailed as heroes in their forest. They taught everyone the importance of friendship, teamwork, and finding safety in numbers so that everyone could stay safe and secure, no matter what life throws their way.
method2_final_output:
Henteu katingal sareng rimbunan hutan ijo hijau di Cina, aya panda anu lucu sareng gemuk anu ngabawa nami "Po". Po ngan sakolahe mangga katukangan sareng nyuguhan babako bambu.

Hiji dinten, sangkan Po ogé nyadar napuna, lalampahan njaluk suara anu gemeretak. Lalampahan! Po kaget sareng teuing naon anu kudu dilebet sacara sahenteuna teuingna henteu pernah nyatakakeun lalampahan. Po ngadangu jeung nempo sagala pohon sareng tanah gemeryang. Saatos punten, Po gaduh kapanewon sareng hayu lari kana tempat pangaman.

Po ngahiji hayu mulai lari nyarengkeun kapanewon anu aman. Po lari sareng lari saméméhna ngajanten pangguingtahana suwung. Po samemeh hayangna mibanda kana dinya mapawongan. Engké Po kaget upami ngan ping pondokna dina kuil.

Ping datang sareng mihareup Po sarta nyarita kansil sateuacana di kana kuil. Po sanang ati teu kalah senang aya sahibukti sareng kaamanan urang hayu di dinya mapawongan.

Sabada eta po bulan sumping sareng ngarungas sareng nyandakan; jeung teuing ngan hareup. Saparantén engaged, Po sareng Ping teu dangu kasamana. Meunang misi sapri xaxatan bersama sareng maranehna sareng tiasa masih kaamanan urang.

Hiji dinten, sangkan Po sok atikan bambuna, sarta po karas owah atas tangkuban. Ku kana kana, Po berkahanayah sorangan sareng muncul ka péngan keur méngah. Po médarkeun sareng maéning sabalikana.

Saatos incident éta, Po sareng Ping dina pairan anu aman sareng nyebar dina dunya satengah-satengahna, ngédarag ngaranna setiap tantangan sabagi tim.

Saha, Po sareng Ping téh panda bayak urang tiasa dianggap salaku pahlawan dina hutan pamano: didedearcha masyarakat important-nya sahabat, tertib étimpe sareng finding safety in numbers.

Anjeunna ngajanten urang aman sareng tetep kaamanan; ogé, leuwih deré ngalawan tantangan ereupan kahirupan henteu kadua.

input: Mangga disediakan skema dekorasi interior nu ngarasakeun gaya Nordik.
method1_output:
Untuk dekorasi interior nu ngarasakeun gaya Nordik, dapat disediakan dekorasi sebagai berikut:
1. Perabotan kayu dengan warna natural atau light pastel.
2. Kain-kain serta bahan tekstil yang bertekstur ringan dan cerah.
3. Dekorasi dinding seperti lukisan atau foto-foto minimalis dengan bingkai hitam atau putih.
4. Hiasan tanaman kaktus atau daun hijau untuk memberikan nuansa alam.
5. Lampu-lampu dengan desain minimalis dan warna putih atau hitam.
6. Karpet dengan warna netral atau pola geometris yang simpel.
7. Furnitur dengan bentuk sederhana dan minimalis.
8. Bantal dekoratif dengan pola atau warna yang simpel.
9. Dekorasi meja dengan lilin, buku atau barang-barang kecil dengan warna netral.
10. Kombinasi warna netral seperti putih, abu-abu dan hitam untuk memberikan kesan steril dan modern.
****************English Meaning****************
For Nordic-style interior decoration, the following decorations can be provided:
1. Wooden furniture with natural or light pastel colors.
2. Fabrics and textiles with light and bright textures.
3. Wall decorations such as minimalist paintings or photos with black or white frames.
4. Cactus or green leaf decorations to bring a natural atmosphere.
5. Minimalist design lamps with white or black colors.
6. Neutral-colored carpets or simple geometric patterns.
7. Furniture with simple and minimalist shapes.
8. Decorative pillows with simple patterns or colors.
9. Table decorations with candles, books, or small items with neutral colors.
10. Neutral color combinations such as white, gray, and black to create a sterile and modern impression.
method2_step1_output: Mango is provided with an interior decoration scheme that brings out the Nordic style.
method2_step2_output: The interior decoration of Mango stores incorporates elements of the Nordic style, known for its simplicity, functionality, and natural materials. The color scheme consists of neutral, white-toned colors, with accents of black and hints of warm wood tones. The furniture, shelving, and fixtures are minimalistic, with clean lines and a focus on functionality. Natural materials such as wood, metal, and leather are used throughout the space, giving a sense of warmth and texture. The lighting also plays an important role, with oversized pendant lights and floor lamps bringing a soft and diffused quality to the space. The overall effect is a modern and inviting atmosphere that reflects Mango's minimalist aesthetic.
method2_final_output: Dekorasana Interior toko Mangga ngandung elemen gaya Nordic, nu dikeur dina kacida, kapentingan, sareng bahan alami. Skema warna dibentuk ku warna netral nu berwarna putih dina sareng aksen hitam sareng pangarti annéhna henteu dijeroan dina bahan kayu soklat. Meubel, rak, sareng perlengkapan nu dimimitian ku minimalis, ngahiji hiji garis sareng fokus ka kapentingan. Bahan alami kaya kayu, logam, sareng kulit dipaké dina ruang, ngahasilkeun atmosfir hangat sareng tiktakan. Cahaya ogé nganyarna rola nu vital, ku lampu gantung nu gedé sareng lampu lantai nerapkeun kualitas nu lami sareng labirin ka ruangan. Nalika dibaca kabéh, athmosfir nu modern sareng ageng panglega nu mérékan ka estétika minimalist Mangga.

input: Mangga ngadamel algoritma Mesin Vector Penompang ngagunakeun Python.
method1_output:
Algoritma Mesin Vector Penompang (SVM) bisa digunakan untuk melakukan klasifikasi dan regresi dengan memanfaatkan data yang diberikan. Berikut adalah contoh implementasi SVM menggunakan Python:

1. Import library

```python
from sklearn import datasets
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.svm import SVC
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
```

2. Load dataset

```python
iris = datasets.load_iris()
X = iris['data']
y = iris['target']
```

3. Split dataset menjadi train set dan test set

```python
X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, random_state=0)
```

4. Training model

```python
model = SVC(kernel='linear')
model.fit(X_train, y_train)
```

5. Melakukan prediksi

```python
y_pred = model.predict(X_test)
```

6. Menampilkan akurasi

```python
print(accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred))
```

Dari implementasi di atas, SVM digunakan untuk mengklasifikasikan data bunga iris berdasarkan fitur-fiturnya. Kemudian, akurasi dapat dihitung dengan membandingkan hasil prediksi dengan label target pada test set.
****************English Meaning****************
The Support Vector Machine (SVM) algorithm can be used to perform classification and regression by utilizing the given data. Here is an example of implementing SVM using Python:

1. Import libraries

```python
from sklearn import datasets
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.svm import SVC
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
```

2. Load dataset

```python
iris = datasets.load_iris()
X = iris['data']
y = iris['target']
```

3. Split the dataset into train set and test set

```python
X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, random_state=0)
```

4. Train the model

```python
model = SVC(kernel='linear')
model.fit(X_train, y_train)
```

5. Perform prediction

```python
y_pred = model.predict(X_test)
```

6. Display the accuracy

```python
print(accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred))
```

From the implementation above, SVM is used to classify the iris flower data based on its features. Then, the accuracy can be calculated by comparing the prediction result with the target label on the test set.
method2_step1_output: We will make Support Vector Machine algorithm using Python.
method2_step2_output:
Great, let's get started!

First, we need to install the required packages for SVM in Python. The most commonly used packages are scikit-learn and numpy. To install them, open your terminal or command prompt and type:

```
pip install scikit-learn numpy
```

Once the packages are installed, we can begin implementing SVM.

The first step is to import the necessary libraries:

```python
from sklearn import svm
import numpy as np
```

Next, we need to load our dataset. For this example, we will use the iris dataset provided by scikit-learn:

```python
from sklearn.datasets import load_iris
iris = load_iris()
X = iris.data
y = iris.target
```

In SVM, it's important to normalize our data to ensure that each feature is on the same scale. We can use the StandardScaler class from scikit-learn to achieve this:

```python
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler
scaler = StandardScaler()
X = scaler.fit_transform(X)
```

Now, we can initialize our SVM model:

```python
model = svm.SVC(kernel='linear', C=1)
```

There are many options for the kernel function in SVM, but for now, we will use the linear kernel. The C parameter controls the trade-off between maximizing the margin and minimizing the margin violations. A larger C value will result in a smaller margin but fewer violations.

Next, we can split our dataset into training and testing sets:

```python
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, test_size=0.3, random_state=0)
```

Now, we can train our model using the training set:

```python
model.fit(X_train, y_train)
```

Finally, we can evaluate the accuracy of our model on the testing set:

```python
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
y_pred = model.predict(X_test)
accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred)
```

And that's it! We have successfully implemented Support Vector Machine algorithm using Python.
method2_final_output:
Kabéh, maranehkeun milu angkat!

Ngan saatos tumuwuhkeun paket diperlukan pikeun SVM dina Python. Paket anu panggunaan paling umum nyaéta scikit-learn sareng numpy. Pikeun tumuwuhkeunana, buka terminal atawa prompt perintah anjeun sareng ketik:

```
pip tumuwuhkeun scikit-learn numpy
```

Kalau paketna geus dipasang, kita tiasa ngawujudkeun SVM.

Tahap kahiji nyaéta ngimpor pustaka anu diperyogikeun:

```python
from sklearn nyaéta svm
import numpy sapertos
```

Kuring, kita butuh ngamuatan dataset kita. Kanggo kasempetan ieu, urang bakal ngagunakeun dataset iris nu disadiakeun ku scikit-learn:

```python
from sklearn.datasets nyaéta ngamuatan_iris
iris = ngamuatan_iris ()
X = iris.data
y = iris.target
```

Dina SVM, penting pikeun nganormalisasi data kita pikeun nyakelkeun yén unggal fitur di sababaraha skala. Kita tiasa ngagunakeun kelas StandardScaler tina scikit-learn pikeun nyampeurkeun ieu:

```python
from sklearn.preprocessing nyaéta StandardScaler
skaler = StandardScaler()
X = scaler.fit_transform(X)
```

Mun sakumna, urang tiasa mimitian model SVM kita:

```python
model = svm.SVC (kernel = 'linear', C = 1)
```

Aya sababaraha pilihan kanggo fungsi kernel dina SVM, tapi pikeun nanaon, urang bakal ngagunakeun kernel linear. Patameter C ngontrol trade-off antara maksimasisasi margin sareng minimaisasi pelanggaran marginna. Nilah C anu sahiji bakal nghasilkeun margin anu lebih qqirna tapi langkung modarat.

Manawi saméméh, urang tiasa ngupayakeun dataset kita kana gabungan sareng tes:

```python
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, test_size=0.3, random_state=0)
```

Ayeuna, urang tiasa rumuyos model kita ngagunakeun dataset anu dicatu sareng ngamimitian sareureunan pikeun pangajaran.

```python
model.fit(X_train, y_train)
```

Terahir, urang tiasa mibanda akurasi model kita dina himpunan tes:

```python
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
y_pred = model.predict(X_test)
accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred)
```

Sareng ieu! Kita geus ngawujudkeun algoritma Mesin Panglipur Dukungan ngagunakeun Python.

input: Mangga mimitian judul ti kontén ieu: CBA Ngahukum Dua Tim sareng Pelatih kanggo "Panggung Henteu Baheula" dina Playoffs Pada tanggal 17 April, Asosiasi Bola Basket Tiongkok ngadakan konferensi pers di mana mere miharep hukuman kanggo Paiheun Singa Jushilong Shanghai sareng tim bola basket Kenitex Suzhou. Tim-tim ieu kena sanksi sakabeh "panggung henteu bagus"ana nalika dua laga makéan kritis dina playoff CBA. Bari nyieun hasil, CBA ngabatalkeun peringkat jeung partisipasi dua tim ieu pikeun musim jeung ngurangan dana liga ku 5 yuta yuan. Manejer umum kenitex Shilinjie sareng sakabeh manejer umum jushilong Jiang Yusheng nerasa penalti ogé, ku Li Chunjiang sareng Li Nan, pelatih kepala Paiheun Jushilong sareng Kenitex Suzhou masing-masing ngalangkungan lisensi pelatihan kanggo lima jeung tilu taun. Sanggeus jadwal asli, babak dua playoffs CBA musim ieu ditetepkeun pikeun ngamimitian kalayan perjuangan antara Marco Polo Shenzhen jeung Shanghai Jushilong. Namun sakalian lila, katahajahan ieu, Marco Polo Shenzhen gaduh klarifikasi otomatis ka semifinal. Zhang Xiong, CEO CBA, nyatujuan hukuman ieu kalayan alat disiplin liga sareng ngaronjatkeun kana astanana sareng pemikiran pangjualan. Yao Ming, Pangawas Bola Basket Tiongkok, ogé ngungkabkei kasangiannya dina hukuman ieu sareng nipukeun pentingna ngetiket kahirupan dina olahraga bari kahirupan. Anjeun teu percaya, leuwih tina ieu kejadian, liga bisa ngarobah pikeun leuwih ameng sareng nyiptakeun hasil anu leuwih pios.
method1_output:
Hukuman Telak diberikan oleh CBA untuk Dua Tim dan Pelatih pada Pertandingan Playoff

Pada tanggal 17 April, Asosiasi Bola Basket Tiongkok mengadakan konferensi pers di mana mereka memberikan hukuman untuk Paiheun Singa Jushilong Shanghai dan tim bola basket Kenitex Suzhou. Kedua tim tersebut kena sanksi karena melakukan "panggung henteu bagus" selama dua laga penting dalam playoff CBA. Sebagai hasilnya, CBA membatalkan peringkat dan partisipasi dua tim tersebut untuk musim ini dan mengurangi dana liga sebesar 5 juta yuan. 

Manajer umum Kenitex Shilinjie dan manajer umum Jushilong Jiang Yusheng juga menerima hukuman dengan pelatih kepala Paiheun Jushilong dan Kenitex Suzhou, Li Chunjiang dan Li Nan, masing-masing kehilangan lisensi pelatihan selama lima tahun. 

Setelah jadwal asli, babak dua playoffs CBA musim ini dimulai dengan Marco Polo Shenzhen melawan Shanghai Jushilong. Namun, karena hukuman tersebut, Marco Polo Shenzhen secara otomatis masuk ke semifinal. 

CEO CBA, Zhang Xiong, mengatakan bahwa hukuman tersebut sejalan dengan prinsip disiplin liga dan akan membantu memperbaiki pengelolaan dan pemikiran bisnis olahraga. Pangawas Bola Basket Tiongkok, Yao Ming, juga mengekspresikan dukungannya terhadap hukuman tersebut dan menekankan betapa pentingnya menghargai kehidupan dan olahraga yang sehat. 

Dari kejadian ini, tampaknya liga dapat membuat perubahan untuk menjadi lebih fair dan menghasilkan hasil yang lebih positif.
****************English Meaning****************
Severe punishment was given by the CBA to Two Teams and Coaches in the Playoff Match

On April 17, the Chinese Basketball Association held a press conference where they gave punishment to the Paiheun Singa Jushilong Shanghai basketball team and the Kenitex Suzhou basketball team. Both teams were sanctioned for conducting "unsportsmanlike behavior" during two important playoff matches in the CBA. As a result, the CBA canceled the ranking and participation of the two teams for this season and reduced the league's funding by 5 million yuan.

General Manager of Kenitex Shilinjie and General Manager of Jushilong Jiang Yusheng also received punishment with head coaches Paiheun Jushilong and Kenitex Suzhou, Li Chunjiang and Li Nan, respectively losing their coaching licenses for five years.

After the original schedule, the second round of the CBA playoffs this season began with Marco Polo Shenzhen against Shanghai Jushilong. However, due to the punishment, Marco Polo Shenzhen automatically entered the semifinals.

CBA CEO Zhang Xiong said the punishment is in line with league discipline principles and will help improve sports management and business thinking. China Basketball Supervisor Yao Ming also expressed his support for the punishment and emphasized the importance of valuing healthy life and sports.

From this incident, it seems that the league can make changes to become fairer and produce more positive results.
method2_step1_output: The title of this content is: CBA Punishes Two Teams and Coaches for "Unsportsmanlike Conduct" in Playoffs On April 17, the Chinese Basketball Association held a press conference where they announced sanctions for the Shanghai Lion Jushilong and the Kenitex Suzhou basketball team. These teams were penalized for their "unsportsmanlike conduct" during two critical playoff games. As a result, CBA cancelled the ranking and participation of these two teams for the season and deducted 5 million yuan from the league's funds. General Manager Shilinjie and all the general managers of Jushilong and Kenitex also received penalties, with head coaches Li Chunjiang and Li Nan each being suspended from coaching for five and three years respectively. After this incident, the CBA announced that the playoffs would start with the match between Marco Polo Shenzhen and Shanghai Jushilong. However, due to the penalty, Marco Polo Shenzhen automatically advanced to the semifinals. CBA CEO Zhang Xiong emphasized that the punishment was aimed to enforce league discipline and promote fairness and justice. Yao Ming, the Director of the Chinese Basketball Association, also expressed his support for the sanctions and stressed the importance of sportsmanship in the sport for the future. It is believed that the league can learn from this incident and work towards better sportsmanship and more positive outcomes.
method2_step2_output: CBA Punishes Two Teams and Coaches for "Unsportsmanlike Conduct" in Playoffs
method2_final_output: CBA ngahukum dua tiim sareng pelatihna pikeun "Unsportsmanlike Conduct" dina Playoff.
